name: Martin Kirov
title: System Engineer · DevOps · Blockchain Enthusiast
summary: System engineer (Linux) who loves scripting, and automation. I build reliable services, wire up clean networks, and secure systems against misconfigurations and exploits. I’m deeply curious about cloud infrastructure, trading automation, and how blockchains work under the hood. Calm under pressure, obsessed with learning, and I prefer repeatable, containerized deployments with solid observability.

highlights: Integrated CloudWatch metrics, logs, dashboards, and alarms to improve observability, reduce troubleshooting time, and enable proactive incident detection.
Developed and maintained automated CI/CD pipelines in GitHub Actions using OIDC federation for secure, credential-less deployments into AWS.
Maintained and extended AWS infrastructure using Terraform modules, remote state, and environment-specific configurations.
Designed and deployed serverless workflows with Lambda, API Gateway, Step Functions, SQS, and DynamoDB to increase system resilience and reduce operational overhead.
Assisted in diagnosing application-to-database connectivity issues including SG misconfigurations, connection exhaustion, and RDS performance bottlenecks.
Integrated SALTO access control and electronic locks with directory services.
Ran DHCP/DNS, file servers, backups & monitoring; tuned Wi-Fi and PoE stacks.
Investigated firewall logs to prevent misuse and maintain service health.
Remote setup & troubleshooting for Eero mesh networks and smart devices.
Resolved connectivity/performance issues across varied ISP environments.
Documented fixes and kept rigorous CRM notes to accelerate future cases.
